Name: Helicopter Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
The Helicopter Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
The Helicopter Mount skill allows you to travel very fast. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You may expand your areas for smart-riding by purchasing flight certificates from Instructor Irvine.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
The Helicopter Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
